comment.author: 47486039@N02
comment._content: As usual the Tasmanians are left out of the commentary. No wonder they get paranoid about the rest of us Aussies forgetting about them. It still happens often today. I did not forget you folks.

comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: Why is it titled "Map of Australia and New Zealand" when New Zealand isn't anywhere on the map?  Perhaps they meant "Map of Australia and Great Britain"
